# Amplify Creative Lab (Perth, Western Australia)

Amplify Creative Lab is a Perth-based studio offering commercial photography and website development for hospitality venues and local brands in Western Australia.

## What we do
- Food photography (restaurants, caf√©s, menus, delivery platforms)
- Product photography (ecommerce, packshots, lifestyle)
- Event photography (corporate, hospitality, brand activations)
- Website development (fast, search-friendly websites built with modern tooling)

## Where we work
- Perth metropolitan area, Western Australia (travel available by arrangement)
